## plot package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [plot(input, plotDef, axisMap)](./plot.plot.md) | Create a plot from regular JavaScript data. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [IAxisConfig](./plot.iaxisconfig.md) | Configures an axis of the chart. |
|  [IAxisMap](./plot.iaxismap.md) | Maps the columns in a dataframe to an axis in the chart. |
|  [IAxisSeriesConfig](./plot.iaxisseriesconfig.md) | Relates a single axis to data series. |
|  [IInputSpec](./plot.iinputspec.md) | Specifies input to the [plot()](./plot.plot.md) function.<!-- -->Add your named data series as fields in this object. |
|  [IPlotAPI](./plot.iplotapi.md) | Fluent API for configuring the plot. |
|  [IPlotConfig](./plot.iplotconfig.md) | Defines the configuration for the chart. |
|  [ISeriesSpec](./plot.iseriesspec.md) | Specifies input to the plot function for a single data series. |
|  [IXAxisConfig](./plot.ixaxisconfig.md) | Configures the X axis of the chart. |
|  [IYAxisConfig](./plot.iyaxisconfig.md) | Configures a Y axis of the chart. |
|  [IYAxisSeriesConfig](./plot.iyaxisseriesconfig.md) | Relates a single Y axis to data series. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [PlotInput](./plot.plotinput.md) | Inputs data to the plot function. |
|  [SeriesSpec](./plot.seriesspec.md) | Specifies input to the plot function for a single data series. Can be an array of values or an ISeriesSpec object. |
|  [ValueArray](./plot.valuearray.md) | A simple array of primitive values or an array of objects (with fields that have primitive values). |
